property.name: cstyle
property.label: Colour style
property.description: Denotes the colour style applied to the footer.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Site title, leave blank if none is desired.

property.name: navHeading
property.label: Navigation heading
property.description: An accessible description for the navigation column. Leave blank to hide the column.

property.name: linksHeading
property.label: Links heading
property.description: An accessible description for the Queensland Government links column. Leave blank to hide the column.

property.name: socialHeading
property.label: Social heading
property.description: An accessible description for social media links column. Leave blank to hide the column.

property.name: facebookUrl
property.label: Facebook URL
property.description: URL of the Facebook page, leave blank to omit the Facebook social icon.

property.name: instagramUrl
property.label: Instagram URL
property.description: URL of the Instagram page, leave blank to omit the Instagram social icon.

property.name: linkedInUrl
property.label: LinkedIn URL
property.description: URL of the LinkedIn page, leave blank to omit the LinkedIn social icon.

property.name: youTubeUrl
property.label: YouTube URL
property.description: URL of the YouTube page, leave blank to omit the YouTube social icon.

property.name: twitterXUrl
property.label: Twitter/X URL
property.description: URL of the Twitter/X page, leave blank to omit the Twitter/X social icon.

property.name: acknowledgementsHeading
property.label: Acknowledgements heading
property.description: An accessible description for the acknowledgement section. Leave blank if not desired.

property.name: acknowledgements
property.label: Acknowledgements
property.description: A text displayed for acknowledgements, for instance an Acknowledgement of Country.
property.default: Queensland Government acknowledges the Traditional Owners of the land and pays respect to Elders past, present and future.

property.name: logo
property.label: Logo
property.description: Logo source and alternative text in Markdown link format.

property.name: logoUrl
property.label: Logo target URL
property.description: URL the user is taken to when clicking on the logo.

property.name: copyrightLink
property.label: Copyright link
property.description: Text and target url of the copyright link in Markdown link format. Leave blank if link is not desired.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
